definition: to raid/an intrusion (of the enemy, or bandit groups)
to flee/to scuttle/to exile or banish/to amend or edit
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: All the bandits that invaded the border area have been wiped out.
sentences.chinese: 竄犯邊境的匪徒已全部被殲。
